GSD.description:
gfs2: Check sb_bsize_shift after reading superblock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit 15c83fa0fd659dd9fbdc940a560b61236e876a80. For more details please see the references link.
